Dana Richardson is a visual arts instructor at Savannah Christian Preparatory School with experience as an artist and gallery associate at KOBO GALLERY LLC.
The tenth annual Boxed In/Break Out is a collaboration between Savannah-based artists Lisa D. Watson and Dana Richardson.
